This is a CRITICAL fix for the "Please Log In on Phone" issue that kills the app. The solution came from the Mach-E forum: 1. Delete all Ford app data on the watch. 2. Uninstall the watch app. 3. Crucially: Factory reset the watch, and DO NOT restore from a backup. Set it up as new. 4. Reinstall the Ford app on the watch. 5. Open the Ford app on your phone first, then on the watch. Setting up the watch without a backup is key!

UPDATE: NEW: If Bolt public or private charging internal configuration stops the charging then "current trip stats" ARE reset. If, however, the charger and/or Bolt stops the charging because you have arrived at 100% charge then the "current trip stats" ARE NOT reset. Manually stopping the charge DOES NOT reset the "current trip stats" even if you manually stop the charging at, say, 98%. My request: reset the "current trip stats" on ALL occasions when ANY charge session has been INITIATED.
